Our Mission

At AUTOBOLI LTD, our mission is to revolutionize the automotive trade by empowering dealers and traders with transparent, accurate, and real-time auction data from across the UK—all in one intuitive platform.

Why We Exist

As experienced car dealers, we’ve faced the challenges of navigating auction pricing and market trends:

Outdated Pricing Guides

Traditional tools like CAP data are often 30 days behind, failing to reflect real-time fluctuations where vehicles sell well beyond CAP Clean estimations.

Regional Price Variations

Auction prices differ significantly across regions. For example, vehicles may sell for less in the north but fetch much higher prices in the south, east, or west—or the other way around.

Fragmented Information

With countless auction houses and branches across the UK, tracking trends and accessing actionable data was nearly impossible.

Financial Risks

A lack of insights into a vehicle's auction history often led to costly mistakes.

How We’re

Changing the Game

We built AUTOBOLI LTD to address these challenges and give traders the data they need to succeed. Our platform offers:

Real-Time Data

Say goodbye to outdated guides and access live auction prices.

Regional Insights

Stay informed on regional price differences to refine your buying strategy.

Auction History

Review comprehensive vehicle histories to make confident, informed decisions.

One Central Hub

Streamline your work with a single platform for all auction data.

WHO WE ARE

AutoBoli LTD

At AUTOBOLI LTD, we envision a future where every dealer and trader can confidently navigate the competitive auction market with seamless access to reliable, real-time insights. By harnessing innovation and industry expertise, we are committed to transforming the way auction data is accessed and utilised.

We recognise the dynamic nature of the automotive market and the need for businesses to adapt swiftly to ever-changing trends. To meet these demands, we continually refine our services, providing advanced tools and transparent data that empower our clients to make informed decisions with ease.

Our goal is to level the playing field, enabling success for businesses of all sizes. With AUTOBOLI LTD, you’re not just adapting to the market—you’re shaping your path to long-term profitability and growth.

What We Offer

At AUTOBOLI LTD, we pride ourselves on delivering comprehensive auction data solutions to car dealers and traders across the UK.

Access to Thousands of Auctions

Our platform aggregates vehicle auction data from across the country, providing you with access to thousands of auctions in one place.

Comprehensive Vehicle Insights

From detailed vehicle specs and condition reports to historical auction data and pricing trends, we ensure that you have all the information you need before making a bid.

Real-time Updates

Never miss an opportunity. Our system keeps you updated with live auction data, giving you the latest information at your fingertips.

Customizable Search Tools

Use our powerful search and filter tools to find exactly what you’re looking for – whether it's a specific make, model, or auction location.

Learn more

Why Choose AUTOBOLI LTD?

At AUTOBOLI LTD, we don’t just offer data – we provide a competitive edge. Our commitment to accuracy, transparency, and ease of use sets us apart in the auction data industry. Here’s why our customers choose us:

Comprehensive Auction Coverage Across the UK

Extensive Auction Coverage We collect data from auctions all across the UK, ensuring that no opportunity slips through the cracks. With AUTOBOLI LTD, you get a 360-degree view of the auction market, empowering you to stay ahead of competitors.

Real-Time Data for Instant Market Insights

Real-Time Data In the fast-paced world of auctions, timing is everything. We provide real-time updates on auction listings and results, so you never miss a key piece of information. Whether you're a local dealer or managing a large operation, you’ll always have the latest data at your fingertips.

User-Friendly Platform for Effortless Access

Easy-to-Use Platform Our platform is designed with simplicity in mind. We know how busy the auto trade can be, so we’ve made it easy for you to access and understand the data. Whether you’re on the go or in the office, our intuitive system keeps you informed with just a few clicks.

Subscription Plans Tailored to Your Needs

Flexible Subscription Plans We offer a range of subscription options to suit businesses of all sizes. From our Silver Plan for smaller operations to our Platinum Plan for large dealers needing advanced analytics, we’ve got a plan that fits your needs. Plus, every new customer can try our service risk-free with a 24-hour free trial!

Unlimited Access to All Auction Data

Full Access to All Data Unlike other services, we don’t limit your access based on subscription tiers. Every subscriber gets full access to all auction data, ensuring that you have every piece of information you need to make the right decisions.

Dedicated and Reliable Customer Support

Reliable Customer Support Your success is our priority. Whether you need technical assistance or help understanding the data, our friendly and knowledgeable support team is here to assist you. With priority support in our Gold and Platinum plans, you’ll always have help when you need it.

Our Vision

AUTOBOLI LTD

At AUTOBOLI LTD, we envision a future where every dealer and trader can confidently navigate the competitive auction market with seamless access to reliable, real-time insights. By harnessing innovation and industry expertise, we are committed to transforming the way auction data is accessed and utilised.

We recognise the dynamic nature of the automotive market and the need for businesses to adapt swiftly to ever-changing trends. To meet these demands, we continually refine our services, providing advanced tools and transparent data that empower our clients to make informed decisions with ease.

Our goal is to level the playing field, enabling success for businesses of all sizes. With AUTOBOLI LTD, you’re not just adapting to the market—you’re shaping your path to long-term profitability and growth.

Make the most of our service in just a few easy steps.

Sign Up and Get Started

Choose the perfect subscription plan—Silver, Gold, or Platinum—and sign up in minutes. Each plan offers tailored benefits to unlock real-time auction data. Start transforming how you navigate the auction market with AUTOBOLI LTD today.

Access Real-Time Data Instantly

Gain immediate access to live auction data across the UK. Filter by region, vehicle type, or auction house to find exactly what you need as soon as it’s listed.

Make Smarter Decisions

Get essential information like auction locations, vehicle details, conditions, and bidding results. Use analytics tools in Gold and Platinum plans to track trends, find deals, and refine your buying strategy.

Get Started

FAQs

1. What does AUTOBOLI LTD do?

We specialize in aggregating vehicle auction data from trusted sources, providing users with comprehensive and reliable information to make informed decisions.

2. Where do you source your auction data?

Our data comes from reputable third-party auction websites such as Aston Barclay, Japanese Auctions, MAG, and Manheim etc.

3. How long have you been in this industry?

We have been serving the vehicle auction market for 20 years, earning trust and credibility through our expertise and commitment to quality.

4. What makes your service unique?

We combine state-of-the-art technology with industry insights to deliver accurate, user-friendly, and up-to-date auction data, saving you time and effort.

5. Can I trust the data provided on your platform?

While we strive for accuracy by sourcing data from reliable platforms, we recommend verifying details directly with the auction provider before making decisions.

6. How can I contact you for more information?

You can reach us via our Contact Us page, email, or phone. Our team is happy to assist you.

Start Accessing Exclusive Auction Data Today!

Get Started

Gain insights into thousands of vehicle auctions and make smarter bidding decisions. Subscribe to access full auction data across the nation.
